description.value:
As a swashbuckler at the peak of your skill, you swell with confidence and bravado in every attack. Your proficiency rank for your swashbuckler class DC increases to master.

When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} as part of a finisher or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EfjoIuDmtUn4yiow]{Opportune Riposte}, you can give the Strike the failure effect from the @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.pyo0vmxUFIFX2GNl]{Confident Finisher} action, including the increase from @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.qeLpqH2cMSmIrILV]{Precise Finisher} if you have that feat. You can do so only if the Strike uses a weapon or unarmed attack that you could use for Confident Finisher.
